seo.title: Manaku | Premium Furniture Collection
seo.description: Exclusive luxury furniture collection. Handcrafted pieces for refined living spaces. Discover exceptional design and uncompromising quality.

footer.description: Curating exceptional furniture pieces that transform spaces into sanctuaries of refined living. Each piece tells a story of craftsmanship and timeless design.

hero.artOfLiving: Manufacturing case and office furniture in Tashkent
hero.subtitle:
We work with private clients and businesses.
In-house production. Warranty up to 3 years.

philosophy.title: Where Craftsmanship Meets Vision
philosophy.description: At Manaku, we believe that furniture is more than function — it's an expression of how we choose to live. Each piece in our collection represents a dialogue between traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design.
philosophy.description2: We partner with master artisans across Italy and Europe who share our uncompromising commitment to quality. From the selection of premium materials to the final hand-finishing, every step is executed with precision and care.
philosophy.description3: The result is furniture that doesn't just fill a space — it transforms it. Pieces that age gracefully, develop character, and become cherished elements of your home for generations.

products.livingDesc: Sculptural sofas and refined seating for modern living spaces
products.bedroomDesc: Serene pieces designed for rest and rejuvenation

seating.description: Comfortable and elegant seating options for every room

dining.description: Refined dining tables and chairs for memorable gatherings

lighting.description: Sculptural lighting solutions that enhance any space

aria.shortDescription: Contemporary lounge chair with sculptural form
aria.description: The Aria Lounge Chair combines sculptural elegance with exceptional comfort. Hand-crafted with premium upholstery and a carefully engineered frame, this piece is designed for refined living spaces.
aria.care: Regular vacuuming and professional cleaning recommended. Avoid direct sunlight to prevent fading.

tavola.shortDescription: Elegant dining table for refined gatherings
tavola.description: The Tavola Dining Table is a masterpiece of traditional craftsmanship. Crafted from solid wood with hand-finished surfaces, it becomes the centerpiece of your dining space.
tavola.care: Use wood-appropriate cleaner and polish. Protect from heat and moisture. Use table pads under hot dishes.

luce.shortDescription: Sculptural floor lamp for ambient lighting
luce.description: The Luce Floor Lamp is designed as a sculptural element that provides warm, ambient lighting. Its elegant form complements any interior style.
luce.care: Dust regularly with a soft cloth. Replace bulbs as needed. Keep away from water.

seo.title: About | Manaku
seo.description: Learn more about Manaku luxury furniture.

about.title:
We work with private clients and businesses.
In-house production. Contract. Up to 3-year warranty.
about.heading: About the Company
about.paragraph1: Manaku was founded on a simple belief: the spaces we inhabit should reflect our highest standards of beauty and quality.
about.paragraph2: We manufacture custom and office furniture in Tashkent, working with both private clients and commercial projects.
about.paragraph3: With in-house production and strict quality control at every stage, we create furniture designed to last for years.
about.artisanalDesc: Every piece is crafted by skilled professionals with attention to detail and execution quality.
about.materialsDesc: We use carefully selected materials from trusted suppliers. Every component is chosen for durability, aesthetics, and provenance.
about.designDesc: We design beyond trends. Furniture that remains relevant and refined for decades is both an aesthetic and responsible choice.
about.sustainabilityText1: Responsible production is part of our philosophy. We minimize waste and prioritize durable materials.
about.sustainabilityText2: By creating furniture built to last, we provide an alternative to disposable culture.
about.manufacturingLine1: Laminated chipboard/MDF cutting on panel saws, PVC edge banding 0.4 / 1 / 2 mm
about.manufacturingLine2: Drilling and assembly on industrial equipment
about.experienceDesc: Visit our Tashkent showroom to experience our materials and craftsmanship firsthand.
